entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 2.6°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of rain or snow. Temperature steady near plus 4.

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Rain ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the morning. High 7. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
